mdx.rawBody:
---
status: draft
shortDescription: "A class referring to a recursive data structure is (indirectly) part of that recursion as well"
shortCorrection: "If a class refers to a recursive data structure, it is not necessarily part of that recursion"
concepts:
  - Class
  - Recursion
related:
# - id: LiteralNoExpression
#   relation: Special case
inOtherPl:
# - pl: JavaScript
#   id: ReferringToRecursiveStructureMakesRecursive
# - pl: Python
#   id: ReferringToRecursiveStructureMakesRecursive
spec:
  - id: jls21
    sections: ["8.2", "8.3"]
plVersion:
# from: jls8
# to: jls14
---

If a class C has a field of type R, where R is a type in a recursive data structure, then class C is (indirectly) part of that recursive data structure.

frontmatter.shortDescription: A class referring to a recursive data structure is (indirectly) part of that recursion as well
frontmatter.shortCorrection: If a class refers to a recursive data structure, it is not necessarily part of that recursion
